Class ACompressor

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter

it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.acompressor.ACompressor
public class ACompressor extends AudioFilter
Wrapper class for the acompressor FFmpeg filter.

  • Method Details

    • setLevelIn

      public void setLevelIn(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the input gain.
      Parameters:
      val - The new input gain
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given input gain is less than 0.015625 or greater than 64

    • setMode

      public void setMode(@NotNull @NotNull String val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the mode.
      Parameters:
      val - The new mode
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new mode is null, empty or a value different from "downward" or "upward"

    • setThreshold

      public void setThreshold(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the threshold as a fraction number. This value is computed as 10^val/20.
      Parameters:
      val - The new threshold in dB
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new threshold is less than 0.00097563 or greater than 1

    • setRatio

      public void setRatio(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the ratio.
      Parameters:
      val - The new ratio
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given ratio is less than 1 or greater than 20

    • setAttack

      public void setAttack(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the amount of milliseconds the signal has to rise above the threshold before gain reduction starts.
      Parameters:
      val - The amount of milliseconds the signal has to rise above the threshold before gain reduction starts
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given amount of milliseconds the signal has to rise above the threshold before gain reduction starts is less than 0.01 or greater than 2000

    • setRelease

      public void setRelease(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the amount of milliseconds the signal has to fall below the threshold before reduction is decreased again.
      Parameters:
      val - The amount of milliseconds the signal has to fall below the threshold before reduction is decreased again
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given amount of milliseconds the signal has to fall below the threshold before reduction is decreased again is less than 0.01 or greater than 9000

    • setMakeup

      public void setMakeup(int val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the makeup value.
      Parameters:
      val - The new makeup value
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new makeup value is less than 1 or greater than 64

    • setKnee

      public void setKnee(double val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the knee value.
      Parameters:
      val - The new knee value. Must be between 1.0 and 8.0
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new knee value is less than 1.0 or greater than 8.0

    • setLink

      public void setLink(@NotNull @NotNull String val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the link value.
      Parameters:
      val - The new link value
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new link value is null, empty or different from "average" or "maximum"

    • setDetection

      public void setDetection(@NotNull @NotNull String val) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the detection value.
      Parameters:
      val - The new detection value
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the new detection value is null, empty or different from "peak" or "rms"
